mapper.select: SELECT title ,content ,reg_date ,eat_no FROM approvalstemp ORDER BY eat_no

SELECT a.ea_no ,a.title ,e.name AS "drafterName" ,a.reg_date ,a.emp_no AS "drafterEmpNo" ,a.status AS "approvalStatus" ,ar.emp_no AS "approverEmpNo"
, a.comp_date
FROM approvals a INNER JOIN employees e ON a.emp_no = e.emp_no LEFT JOIN approvers ar ON a.ea_no = ar.ea_no WHERE (a.emp_no = #{userEmpNo} OR ar.emp_no = #{userEmpNo})
AND a.status = 'a1'
AND a.status = 'a2'
AND a.status = 'a3'
AND a.status = 'a4'
ORDER BY a.reg_date

SELECT a.ea_no ,a.title ,e.name as "drafterName" ,a.reg_date ,a.emp_no as "drafterEmpNo" ,a.status as "approvalStatus"
,a.comp_date
FROM approvals a INNER JOIN approvers ar ON a.ea_no = ar.ea_no JOIN employees E ON a.emp_no = e.emp_no
WHERE a.status IN ('a3','a4') AND (a.emp_no = #{userEmpNo} OR ar.emp_no = #{userEmpNo})
WHERE a.status IN ('a3','a4') AND (a.emp_no = #{userEmpNo})
WHERE a.status IN ('a3','a4') AND (ar.emp_no = #{userEmpNo})
WHERE a.status IN ('a3','a4') AND (a.emp_no = #{userEmpNo} OR ar.emp_no = #{userEmpNo})
ORDER BY a.comp_date

SELECT a.title ,a.content ,a.reg_date ,a.comp_date ,a.emp_no as "drafterEmpNo" ,e.name as "drafterName" ,a.status as "approverStatus" ,a.ea_no ,a.eat_no FROM approvals a LEFT JOIN employees e ON a.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE a.ea_no = #{eaNo}

SELECT r.status as "approverStatus" ,e.name as "approverName" ,e.emp_no as "approverEmpNo" ,p.name as "positionTitle" ,r.sort as "approverSort" ,r.ear_no as "earNumber" FROM approvals a JOIN approvers r ON a.ea_no = r.ea_no JOIN employees e ON r.emp_no = e.emp_no JOIN positions P ON e.posi_no = p.posi_no WHERE a.ea_no = #{eaNo} ORDER BY r.sort

SELECT p.posi_no ,e.name as "empName" ,p.name as "posiName" ,e.emp_no ,d.name as "deptName" FROM employees e JOIN positions p ON e.posi_no = p.posi_no JOIN departments d ON e.dept_no = d.dept_no ORDER by p.posi_no
